Class EncoderStreamImpl

java.lang.Object
us.mn.state.dot.tms.server.BaseObjectImpl
us.mn.state.dot.tms.server.EncoderStreamImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
SonarObject, EncoderStream, Storable
public class EncoderStreamImpl extends BaseObjectImpl implements EncoderStream
Video encoder stream.
Author:
Douglas Lau
